Sugar_Land.Tuong Phat Quan Am: Tượng Phật Quan Âm (Vietnamese, English: Buddha Statue of Avalokitesvara) is a cast concrete statue in Chùa Việt Nam (English: Vietnamese Buddhist Center) in Sugar Land, Texas, just outside of Houston. The sculpture depicts the bodhisattva Avalokitesvara in female form standing on a lotus pedestal. She may also be commonly known by her Chinese name Guanyin.
